title: Find a Cure
tags: how to unlock find a cure
content:
Such as? My time could be running short. I can't afford to spend it paying you a house visit. [WARLOCK] There is something strange about you.

Choosing the WARLOCK option will give you three more Warlock responses:

[WARLOCK] You have a certain bearing. An almost fey-like quality. [WARLOCK] I detect something devilish, I think. [WARLOCK] Might you hail from Thay, perhaps?

Choosing the first option will make her shrug off the idea, and she's just an old woman who loves tea and potions. She then
